column2: **details:** The data frame or data address of predicted values generated by predict
**details:** If string, it must be a .shp file including geometries
If a list of tuples, each element must contain the latitude and
If a list of lists, it should have 2 items, first a list of latitudes
and second a list of longitudes.
In either case, the geometries must be arranged according to the
*spatial_ids* input, and if this input is None, the order must
be in accordance with the order of spatial ids in the *predictions*
**details:** A list of spatial ids for which predicted values
If None is passed, all the spatial ids in the *predictions* file
**details:** The ids of the temporal ids for which predicted values
If None is passed, all the temporal ids in the *predictions* file
**details:** The name of the model in the *predictions*
file whose predicted values (classes) are displayed on the map.
